common.app_description: Upload your chat screenshots or describe your situation. Our AI detective analyzes the context, detects lies, and gives you relationship advice. Your data is processed anonymously for analysis.
common.persona_dedektif_desc: Analyzes your relationship situation, detects red flags, and exposes hidden intentions.
common.persona_taktik_desc: Helps you craft the perfect opening lines, replies, and date invites. Your personal wingman for texting.

sidebar.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?

prompts.ex_wrote_late: My ex texted me at 3 AM. What is the subconscious reason for writing at this hour?
prompts.ex_wrote_casual: My ex sent a normal message as if we never broke up. What is their goal?
prompts.ex_wrote_regret: My ex explicitly wrote 'I miss you'. Is this a trap or is it real?
prompts.ex_wrote_drunk: My ex sent nonsense messages while drunk. Will they regret it in the morning?
prompts.ex_wrote_oldpic: My ex sent an old photo of us from our relationship. Is this emotional manipulation?
prompts.ex_story_fast: My ex viewed my story immediately after I posted it. Are their notifications on?
prompts.ex_story_fake: I think my ex is watching my story from a fake account. Why are they hiding?
prompts.ex_story_reply: My ex replied to my story with a flame emoji. Is this a call to 'come back'?
prompts.ex_story_like: My ex liked a very old photo of mine (Stalking). What is their goal?
prompts.ex_behavior_blocked: My ex blocked me from everywhere for no reason. Why?
prompts.ex_behavior_jealous: My ex is constantly sharing posts showing they are having fun with others. Is it out of spite?
prompts.ex_behavior_friend: My ex insisted on 'staying friends'. Are they keeping me as a backup?
prompts.flirt_comm_late: My situationship constantly replies hours later but is online.
prompts.flirt_comm_dry: My situationship's messages have become short and cold lately. Is their interest gone?
prompts.flirt_comm_ghost: My situationship suddenly stopped texting (Ghosting). What could be the reason?
prompts.flirt_comm_seen: They saw my message but didn't reply. Is it over?
prompts.flirt_date_ask: We keep talking but they never ask for a date. Are they just a pen pal?
prompts.flirt_date_cancel: Cancelled our date last minute with an excuse. Are they lying?
prompts.flirt_date_home: Invited me to their place on the first few dates. Is their intention only physical?
prompts.flirt_mixed_lovebomb: We just met but they act like they are in love with me (Love Bombing). Should I trust them?
prompts.flirt_mixed_extalk: They constantly talk about their ex. Do they see me as a rebound?
prompts.crush_interaction_eye: The person I have a crush on makes eye contact with me often. Do they like me?
prompts.crush_interaction_story: My crush replied to my story. How should I continue the conversation?
prompts.crush_interaction_close: They stand physically close to me and touch me. Is it friendly or flirting?
prompts.crush_friendzone_bro: My crush calls me 'bro', 'buddy'. How do I get out of the friendzone?
prompts.crush_friendzone_others: They talk about liking others in front of me. Do they see me as a friend?
prompts.partner_trust_phone: My partner hides their phone from me. Could they be cheating?
prompts.partner_trust_lie: I caught a small lie from my partner. are they hiding other things?
prompts.partner_trust_online: They are online late at night but not writing to me. Who are they talking to?
prompts.partner_fight_silent: They have been giving me the 'Silent Treatment' for days after the fight. What should I do?
prompts.partner_fight_disrespect: They insulted me and acted disrespectfully while fighting. Has this relationship become toxic?
prompts.open_insta_story: I want to slide into their DMs by replying to their story. What should I say?
prompts.open_insta_cold: We never talked, but I want to DM them directly. What can I say to get attention?
prompts.open_insta_note: What should I write on my Instagram Notes to get their attention?
prompts.open_app_match: We matched on Tinder/Bumble. I don't want to say 'Hey', give me a creative opener.
prompts.open_app_bio: I want to open with a reference to their bio. Give me a suggestion.
prompts.open_real_gym: I want to talk to someone I saw at the gym. How do I approach without being creepy?
prompts.open_real_cafe: I want to talk to the person at the next table in a cafe/bar. Give me a natural excuse.
prompts.reply_ghost_funny: I want to send a funny/meme message to revive a ghosted chat.
prompts.reply_ghost_provoke: Suggest a message to provoke/neg the person who ghosted me.
prompts.reply_dry_topic: The convo is dying, they just said 'yeah'. Give me an interesting question to switch topics.
prompts.reply_dry_flirty: I want to turn this boring conversation into something flirty and exciting instantly.
prompts.reply_reject_soft: They want to meet but I don't. How do I reject them politely?
prompts.reply_reject_hard: They were disrespectful. Give me a savage comeback to put them in their place.
prompts.date_ask_casual: I want to ask them out for coffee/drinks. Suggest a chill (non-needy) message.
prompts.date_ask_creative: Invite them to a creative date idea other than the classic dinner/movie.
prompts.date_after_good: The date was great. What should I text when I get home? (Without looking too eager).
prompts.date_after_bad: The date was bad, no spark. How do I cut off communication?

result_lock.title: Unlock Full Analysis
result_lock.description: Log in to see the detailed report, relationship advice, and red flags.

chat.input_placeholder: Spill the tea or drop a screenshot...
chat.quiz_result_prompt: I just took the {quiz} and got: {result} ({score}/{total}). What does this mean for my relationship?

persona.dedektif_desc: Analyzes your relationship situation, detects red flags, and exposes hidden intentions.
persona.taktik_desc: Helps you craft the perfect opening lines, replies, and date invites. Your personal wingman for texting.

auth.title: AskAnaliz
auth.subtitle: Sign in to you account
auth.no_account: Don't have an account? Sign Up
auth.register_success: Registration successful! Please check your email.
auth.have_account: Already have an account? Sign In

quizzes.title: Quizzes
quizzes.subtitle: Psychological tests to help you understand your relationship better.

gaslighting.title: Gaslighting Test
gaslighting.description: Do you feel manipulated? Analyze the situation with scientifically based questions.

cheating.title: Cheater Archetypes
cheating.description: Which profile does your partner fit? Discover the hidden signs.

attachment.title: Attachment Style
attachment.description: Anxious or Avoidant? Learn your relationship dynamics.

lovebomb.title: Love Bombing Detector
lovebomb.description: Is the affection real or a manipulation tactic?

gaslighting: Do you constantly doubt your own memory?
Are you often told you are 'too sensitive' or 'overreacting'?
Do you end up apologizing even when you are right?
cheating: Does your partner constantly hide their phone?
Are there unexplained changes in their schedule recently?
Is there sudden loss of interest or excessive affection (guilt gifts)?
attachment: Do you panic and cling more when your partner pulls away?
Does emotional intimacy feel suffocating to you?
Do you constantly fear abandonment in relationships?
lovebomb: Did they shower you with excessive gifts and compliments early on?
Did they call you 'soulmate' and plan the future very quickly?
Does their interest turn to anger when you set boundaries?
